document.full_text: after nearly 10 years of operations and gradual acceptance, hawkeye has embarked on its biggest challenge: installing 80 cameras, covering all eight competition courts, for the bnp paribas open, which begins here monday.
document.title: at indian wells, hawkeye expands its vision
lines_and_colors: after nearly 10 years of operations and gradual acceptance, hawkeye has embarked on its biggest challenge: installing 80 cameras, covering all eight competition courts, for the bnp paribas open, which begins here monday.
